original_title: Glasgow Rangers: Bosses Of The Old Firm
overview: THERE is nothing quite like the drama, passion, excitement and rivalry in the Old Firm derby a fixture that is revered around the world and affects the lives of millions. There have been magical performances, sensational goals and memorable victories for Rangers since the inception of the SPL in 1998 and it s time to re-live them all again. Indeed there are certain moments that will live long in the memory of all Rangers fans and we take you through the best of them. Spanning the reigns of Dick Advocaat, Alex McLeish, Walter Smith and now Ally McCoist you can enjoy moments of magic and sheer joy as the old rivals are put to the sword again and again.
title: Glasgow Rangers: Bosses Of The Old Firm
